articles.summary: A 68-year-old retiree from Castlegar has lost $122,000 in an investment scam. The scam involved a team of men working together, playing different roles. She was contacted by someone claiming to be from the CRA Anti-fraud Department. She had to pay an upfront tax of 35% before they would release the money. She is now looking for a way to fight back.
